DOC.brief_summary: Investigate efficacy safety Vardenafil patient spinal cord injury
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Efficacy Safety Vardenafil Patients Erectile Dysfunction Solely Secondary Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.criteria: Males ≥18 year erectile dysfunction ( ED ) solely result traumatic spinal cord injury ( SCI ) ≥6 month demonstrate 50 % failure intercourse attempt 4week runin period . Stable heterosexual relationship least 1 month . Subjects unstable medical psychiatric condition use prohibit concomitant medication Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate therapy Other exclusion criterion apply accord US Product Information Summary Product Characteristics
